description:
Being part of the academic environment means that you are expected to comply with writing standards and guidelines as stipulated by your university and present your ideas in a professional manner.

Thorugh the lecturers, I will guide you on how to conduct a literature review. Since there is no officially accepted guide about how to conduct a literature review, the content of this course provides a variety examples and techniques that help to identify, analyze and understand the relationship between the main contributors in your researched field; in other words the authors whose work you read. Moreover, throughout the learning process you will understand what is actually expected from a literature review chapter.
title: Learn How to Write a Great Literature Review Chapter
